description:
In this course titled 'Control Your Words To Control Your Manifestation.' By Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn -

How words are very powerful and create a deep impact on our mind and manifestation. In this video course, you will learn how words control our manifestation and why we should be careful about the words we use. If you want to manifest your desires in your life, you have to keep an eye on the words that you use.

You will learn a wonderful exercise which will demonstrate the power of words to you. Learn how certain words ignite positiveness whereas certain words create negative impact on our mind and ultimately our manifestation.

You will learn the 3 different types of negative speaking words that takes away your positive energy and bring you down. And how they can be reversed using positive speaking words.

This course is ideal for people who speak negatively and low energy words which affect their growth and success. People who want to achieve more success and attract more positiveness in their life should take this course to become more successful.

This course is in English and contains more than 8 live recorded lectures and one bonus e-book on affirmations.
title: Control Your Words To Control Your Manifestation
